body: Well, it looks like the answer is that my beta tester's phone does not support live wallpapers. It's a Samsung Galaxy Core Prime -- a very basic phone. The odd thing is some other wallpaper apps do install, but I think they must be working around the lack of the live wallpaper API somehow, perhaps they are just clever animated gifs. I am not sure. I'll have to look into it more. If anyone else knows, please tell.
title: minSdkVersion not working?
